Ive not even thought about it, he said. Ive got to be careful with who I pick and choose because I dont … [+3688 chars]

articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Australia to tour India for multi-format women's series in December 2023-January 2024 - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The tour will follow England's three T20Is and Test match, with both sets of matches to be played in Mumbai and Navi Mumbai
